name: HIPAA - Breach Notification
description: HIPAA (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act) is a binding regulation for organizations operating in the USA. This pack follows through with the notification procedures in case of PHI breach according to HIPAA requirements. The pack contains a playbook, incident type, layouts and incident fields. HIPAA breach notification incident and follows through with the notification procedures.
author: Cortex XSOAR
